hero.title: Smart Agriculture

hero.description: Connecting farmers and agricultural workers through technology. Access government schemes, real-time market prices, and equipment marketplace all in one place.

featuresSection.title: Why Choose Our Platform?
featuresSection.subtitle: We provide comprehensive solutions for modern agriculture with cutting-edge technology.

features.connectDesc: Bridge the gap between farmers and agricultural workers with our smart matching system.
features.marketDesc: Stay updated with live market prices for crops, grains, and vegetables.
features.schemesDesc: Access information about government agricultural schemes and subsidies.
features.equipmentDesc: Buy and sell agricultural equipment with ease and transparency.

about.title: Empowering Agriculture Through Technology
about.description: Our platform bridges the gap between traditional farming and modern technology.
about.farmerDesc: Manage operations, find workers, access schemes
about.workerDesc: Find jobs, build reputation, grow career

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Agricultural Journey?

description_hint: Provide details about the equipment, including specifications, usage hours, maintenance history, and any included accessories
